org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game

Interface ControllableGameSolver<T extends Strategy<?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the strategies
    All Superinterfaces:
    Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, ControllableAlgorithm, java.util.EventListener, GameSolver<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractControllableGameSolver, BigStepSolver, ClassicalBuchiSolver, DominionDecompositionSolver, McNaughtonZielonkaSolver, RecursiveSolver

    public interface ControllableGameSolver<T extends Strategy<?>>
extends GameSolver<T>, ControllableAlgorithm
    This interface provides additional methods for controllable game solvers such that the game can be colored with various colors during each step.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

      Returns the solution coloring used to color currently known winning regions.
